system_overview: 9 POML (Prompt Object Markup Language) files totaling 1,374 lines representing meta-prompt infrastructure—prompts that generate prompts, extract ideal types, produce structured analytical outputs.

mindsets_paradigms.current: Prompts as ephemeral text; one-off conversations
mindsets_paradigms.target: Prompts as structured, versionable, composable infrastructure
mindsets_paradigms.intervention: recursive.poml principle: prompts all the way down

organizing_principles.target: POML as standard with schemas, inheritance, composition

information_flows.current: No visibility into which prompts others use

system_infrastructure.target: POML compiler that validates and executes

poml_library_contents.purpose: Multi-ledger ethical diagnostic with 7 lenses and stress tests
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Apply plural ethics frames simultaneously; use Lessig modes as repair levers

poml_library_contents.purpose: Weberian ideal type extraction + Bayesian updating + myth layer
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Build ideal types as limiting constructs; update beliefs with evidence

poml_library_contents.purpose: De Certeau tactics concordance extraction from source texts
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Map tactics vs strategies; identify mētis in practice

poml_library_contents.purpose: POML→POML forge for parody essay generation
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Extract ideal type + parodic mechanics; generate child POML
Rapid scaffold for parody essay production
Invert source text to expose latent prompt logic
Convert flat prompts into structured POML format

poml_library_contents.purpose: Prompts that generate prompts that generate prompts
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Every prompt must spawn at least 3 further prompts

poml_library_contents.purpose: Extract author's implicit 'prompt logic' from their texts
poml_library_contents.meta_rule: Surface the OS of any thinker; generate prompts in their style

dynamic_processes.embedded_values: LLM culture values novel outputs; infrastructure is invisible
dynamic_processes.process_redesign_opportunity: Make prompt engineering as visible as code engineering

social_positionalities.power_dynamics: Prompt engineers often invisible; 'vibe coders' dismissed
social_positionalities.safety_concerns: Sharing prompts can reveal competitive advantage
social_positionalities.legitimized_expertise: POML legitimizes prompt work as engineering discipline

invisible_work.emotional_labor: Dead ends, frustrated rewrites, breakthrough moments
invisible_work.unrecognized_labor: Prompts look 'obvious' once finished; labor invisible

embedded_systems.economic_logics: LLM providers capture value from user prompt engineering labor

integrated_intervention_strategies.infrastructure_work: Demonstrate prompts as infrastructure; provide reusable patterns across domains

integrated_intervention_strategies.intervention: Document library with typology and course connections
integrated_intervention_strategies.infrastructure_work: poml-library.md explains each file; connects to course readings
Shared platform for POML discovery, validation, extension
Validate schema, execute against LLM, return structured output

invisible_trail: Figuring out how to nest POML inside POML (parody.poml)
recursive.poml breakthrough: 'prompts all the way down'
Each POML represents dozens of iterations

meta_rule: Analyze prompt engineering by asking: What structures enable prompt reuse, composition, and recursion (POML as infrastructure), AND what infrastructural conditions (community platforms, IP norms, economic incentives) would make prompt work visible and valued?
